name: Cuboku - Simple XV Cube
description:
Help

Right-click + drag to rotate the cube. Use Shift while dragging to lock an axis of rotation.  Click on a single selected cell to change the focused row, box, or pair of faces. While left-clicking to select cells, you can drag and/or hold Shift to select multiple.

Contact

Want to construct and publish your own puzzle with this interface or give feedback on it's current implementation? DM me @ethz#1365 on Discord.

Hotkeys

Unwrap CubeANormal (Single Digit Input)ZCenterXCornerCDelete Cell Digit/OptionsBkspc/Del
